attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should people who live in coucil housing, who dont and have no interest in working live for free when most people work their fingers to the bone. make them do jobs like litter picking or cleaning.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
